text: Anyone else get really buggy behavior when making a color field a repeater? The opacity field disappears half the time for me
found the propblem fwiw… i had to put values on the containing group’s default value

Yeah I saw that as well and I’m freakin stoked. I really hope breakpoint module settings become a thing asap.

I have seen some bits of code like this fail to come to fruition, but I doubt this won’t get across the finish line. Too many people have been asking
